content.question: Answer the following question(s) in English unless the question specifically asks you to provide Latin words. Identify what Paris did to make Juno angry and thus cause the Trojan War.

unit.text: 5: Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 4, 6, 7, 11, and 12
